Bases: object

Base controller class.

controllers.document module¶

class controllers.document.Document(parent=None)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtCore.QObject

Here we can get the changes that are made in real time to send signals to our tools

controllers.file module¶

class controllers.file.FileController(app)¶

Bases: controllers.base.Controller

fileNew()¶

This function allows the user to create a new file stablishing where does the user want to save it

fileOpen()¶

This function allows the user to open a file

fileSaveChanges()¶

This function allows the user to save the changes in the opened file

saveAs()¶

This function allows the user to save a file using a different name or path

writeFile(file, text)¶

This function allows the user to edit a file

controllers.text module¶

class controllers.text.TextEditingTools(app)¶

Bases: controllers.base.Controller

Creating the basic functions that allows the user to do the basic things with the text using the buttons located at the menu or the tool bars

controllers.views module¶

class controllers.views.PreviewPage¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWebEngineWidgets.QWebEnginePage

class controllers.views.ViewsController(app)¶

Bases: controllers.base.Controller

openSubWindow()¶

This function shows the markdown text provided by the user in a parallel window transformed to HTML in real time

toggleStyleSheet()¶

This function toggles the app theme between dark and light
